meanings.definition: Neat and orderly in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: Her room is the tidiest in the house.
meanings.sent2: The tidiest student always turns in their homework on time.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to be the tidiest by arranging its toys neatly.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like the tidiest painting in a gallery.
meanings.sent5: The tidiest desk had everything in its perfect place.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the rooms, hers is the tidiest.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps her desk the tidiest in the office.
meanings.sent3: The tidiest cake at the party was gone in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The tidiest mind can find peace in chaos.
meanings.sent5: The tidiest outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
